sense.gloss: photography (still or motion), photographing, filming, shooting, (video) recording
to record (audio or video), to film, to shoot
tokusatsu (genre of live-action film or television drama that makes heavy use of special effects, e.g. Godzilla)
to be able to take (a photograph)
snack (to have with a drink), side dish
snitching food, snatched food, secret eating, food snatched and eaten without the meal starting
taking a picture, taking an image, imaging
to pinch, to hold (between one's fingers), to pick up (with chopsticks, tweezers, etc.)
to pick up and eat, to snack on
to pick out (the main point), to summarize, to sum up
to bewitch, to possess, to fascinate

sdata.j: ここで↑写真↑↓しゃしん↓を↑撮↑↓と↓らないでください。
sdata.e: Please do not take photos here.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑写真↑↓しゃしん↓を↑撮↑↓と↓ってもいい？
あなたの↑写真↑↓しゃしん↓を↑撮↑↓と↓ってもいいですか。
↑許可↑↓きょか↓なく↑劇場↑↓げきじょう↓↑内↑↓ない↓で↑写真↑↓しゃしん↓を↑撮↑↓と↓ることはできません。
sdata.e: You cannot take a picture in the theater without permission.

sdata.j: ↑拡大↑↓かくだい↓コピーを↑撮↑↓と↓ってくるよ。
sdata.e: I'm going to make enlarged copies.

sdata.j: ↑海↑↓うみ↓をバックに↑記念↑↓きねん↓↑写真↑↓しゃしん↓↑撮↑↓と↓ろうよ。
sdata.e: Let's get a picture of us with the sea in the background.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なん↓↑枚↑↓まい↓↑撮↑↓と↓りですか。
sdata.e: How many exposures would you like?

sdata.j: ↑暗闇↑↓くらやみ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓で↑彼↑↓かれ↓が↑写真↑↓しゃしん↓を↑撮↑↓と↓るのは↑不可能↑↓ふかのう↓だ。
sdata.e: It was impossible for him to take the picture in the dark.

sdata.j: ここでストロボ↑撮影↑↓さつえい↓をしてもいいですか。
sdata.e: Is it all right to use a flash here?

sdata.j: どこで↑写真↑↓しゃしん↓を↑撮↑↓と↓ってもらいましたか。
sdata.e: Where did you have your picture taken?

words.gloss: photography (still or motion), photographing, filming, shooting, (video) recording
